content: wrap your ears in cozy texture with the **wheat stitch™ crochet earwarmer pattern** a stylish comfortable accessory that s perfect for chilly mornings winter walks and everyday wear this crochet earwarmer is worked flat in row using ** my signature wheat stitch™ 1 ** which follows an easy-to-memorize 4-row repeat the construction is simple and satisfying you ll crochet the length first to comfortably fit around the head then build the width through the repeating stitch pattern once your earwarmer reaches the desired length the short ends are brought together and joined with a clever c style seam this finishing technique creates the look of a chic front twist without actually twisting the fabric giving you a polished modern finish with minimal bulk perfect for confident beginners and experienced crocheters alike this wheat stitch earwarmer works up quickly and makes a wonderful handmade gift craft fair item or cozy wardrobe staple and with 7 sizes included in the pattern this project is a cozy must-make you ll come back to again and again a video tutorial is included 2 **crochet hook ** g+/7 4 5mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 **yarn ** malabrigo rios 7 100% fine superwash merino wool 210yds/100g optional mohair addition malabrigo mohair 8 72% mohair 28% silk 229yds/25g **yarn quantities ** with one color 34 42 60 75 90 130 155 yds if double-stranding with mohair add an equal amount of mohair yardage **yarn substitutions ** soho playful 9 - 65% acrylic/35% cotton 218yds/100g berroco vintage worsted 10 - 52% acrylic/40% wool/8% nylon 218yds/100g wecrochet mighty stitch 11 - 80% acrylic/20% superwash wool 208yds/100g cascade 220 12 - 100% pure peruvian highland wool 220yds/100g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain flo - front loop only rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** 16 sts and 16 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern repeat not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 **sizes ** newborn baby toddler child adult small medium large to fit head circumference 12-14 14-16 16-18 18-20 21-22 22-23 23-24 this earwarmer is crocheted with approximately negative 2-3 inch ease **skill level ** advanced beginner **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2026 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal
